org.apache.flex.compiler.asdoc

Interface IASDocDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NilASDocDelegate, SimpleASDocDelegate

    public interface IASDocDelegate
    Delegate interface used by the ASParser to record ASDoc information encountered while parsing ActionScript or meta-data tags.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IASDocComment createASDocComment(ISourceLocation location, IDocumentableDefinition definition)
      Called by MXML tree building code to create an IASDocComment for classes defined by MXML files.
      IASParserASDocDelegate getASParserASDocDelegate()
      Get's an implementation of IASParserASDocDelegate that can be used by the ASParser to record information about ASDoc comments encountered while parsing ActionScript.
      IPackageDITAParser getPackageDitaParser()
      Get's an implementation of IPackageDITAParser that can be used by the SWCReader to parse DITA information found in a SWC.

    • Method Detail

      • getASParserASDocDelegate

        IASParserASDocDelegate getASParserASDocDelegate()
        Get's an implementation of IASParserASDocDelegate that can be used by the ASParser to record information about ASDoc comments encountered while parsing ActionScript.

        Implementations of the IASParserASDocDelegate interface that record ASDoc data are stateful and can not be shared between ASParser instances.

        Returns:
        an implementation of IASParserASDocDelegate that can be used by the ASParser to recored information about ASDoc comments

      • createASDocComment

        IASDocComment createASDocComment(ISourceLocation location,
                               IDocumentableDefinition definition)
        Called by MXML tree building code to create an IASDocComment for classes defined by MXML files.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the ASDoc text in an MXML file.
        definition - The IDefinition the ASDoc documents
        Returns:
        A new IASDocComment or null.

      • getPackageDitaParser

        IPackageDITAParser getPackageDitaParser()
        Get's an implementation of IPackageDITAParser that can be used by the SWCReader to parse DITA information found in a SWC.
        Returns:
        An implementation of IPackageDITAParser.
